dialog: Hello Dude
Find me 5 bits of wood and I can fix the bridge
Woah! I can fix the bridge now, thanks!
Hey! Could you help me with my music box?
I stored away my nuts, but I forgot the note order to unlock it!
If you can unlock it, you can take the key I found as a thank you
Thanks for helping with my music box!
Where are my friends?
Hmmm, I can see something at the bottom, but I can't reach it...
I can reach it now!
Hmm, looks like there is a missing piece.
Hmmm, maybe I have an item for this?
Let me try this...
Hmm seems to be locked...
Now I can unlock it!
Hmm seems to be locked...
The shed is empty. You have already robbed it of anything useful...
Now I can unlock it!
Hmmm I could really go for some fish right now......
Oh! Hey you! Get me 5 fish and I will open the maze for you
Here, take this fishing rod
Have you got my fish yet?
No? Oh.. Well here is the fishing guide again if you need it;
WOAH! Thanks for the fish ^O^
Here, i'll unlock the maze for you!
Thanks again for the fish!
